text_block_list.text: Meisho Doto and I were supposed to train today, but...

She's not the type to slack off on training, so I figured she might 
have run into some trouble, and went looking for her.

After around ten minutes of looking around the school―― 
I found her trembling in front of the flowerbed, her back muddied 
brown.
Boohoo................... Huwuuuuuuhhhhhhh.... Pat pat, pat pat, pat pat...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Whhau!? Ah, T- Trainer-san...!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Ah! Well, umm...! There's an unavoidable reason for... 
well, it was avoidable, sort of, you could say――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: You should go get changed first!

text_block_list.text: R- right...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I helped wash her filthy jersey and set it out to dry. 
With that out of the way, I once again asked her what happened.

――Well, I thought I would get some practice in myself before 
training... So I went on a little run.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
When I was around the flower beds, I slipped and fell... 
And it's just my luck I fell onto a messy spot...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Riiight... Ah, b-but the silver lining is, there wasn't anything 
planted there!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I left a big outline of my body in the soil, so I was trying to fix it 
by going pat pat, pat pat... Like that...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: Right, now I get why you were late.

text_block_list.text:
Augh! S-sorry... 
A-are you mad...? You are, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She had a good reason for being late, so that I could take in 
stride. The real issue was――
choice_data_list: <size=38>I'd like a heads-up if you go practice alone.</size>

text_block_list.text:
What...? No, but... 
Then I wouldn't really be practicing alone...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: But that way, I can give you advice.

text_block_list.text:
It's something I was doing for my own sake... 
It just doesn't feel right to make even more trouble for you to 
deal with――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I- I mean... just today I goofed up, was late, and we had to stop 
training. I'm always doing things like that that.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Like the time I tried to get the training records in order and 
accidentally deleted everything, or the time I tried to help 
maintain the track and got tangled up with the road roller...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
The time I messed up step practice and got sand everywhere, 
the time I tried getting water and got soaked, the time I got a 
towel caught in a zipper and the metal bits flew out―
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=40>I-It's okay, you don't need to keep going.</size>

text_block_list.text: It's not okayyyyy!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I already cause so, so much trouble for you as it is, Trainer-san... 
I can't waste any more of your precious tiiiiime....!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
While it's true she was clumsy beyond belief, that's no reason 
for her to feel so guilty. Because no matter what――

I'm her trainer. No matter how much trouble she causes, I'll 
gladly do everything in my power to help her grow. I wanted her 
to understand that.
AWAAAAAAAAAAAAH!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: L-l-look out the window...! My jersey's flying awayyyyyy!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Ah! What if turning it toward the wind to make it dry faster came back to bite me...!? I- I need to go get iiiittt!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Awhhaa!? I- I'm sorr―― UWAH!? I'm sorry, so sorry...! W-wait uuuuupp...!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She dashed away without giving me so much as a second to stop 
her. But not without running into a desk first...

I wanted her to think of me as "someone she's free to trouble". 
Still without a clue how to do that, I ran after her.
My jerseyyyy...!!!! Come baaaaaaaaaaaaackkkk........ Bwuh!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
